THE SATURDAY EVENING POST
Sun-warmed Deaches Ake Montego Day, Jamaica, are waing for you in the west Indies
.. No snow, no cold rain, just the trade wind blowing every day-and fun —and rest!
Plan now to
ESCAPE FROM WINTER
to these SUNLIT ISLES
By Flying Clipper, the West Indies are now
less than a day away from any point in the U.S.
...New York to San Juan is only 8 hours.
NEW YORK
M-m-m! New hat. West Indies stle? No. iust the way the natives in Haiti carry
bananas, baskets and many other wares to market. Wouldn't you like (left) to
taste the milk, right out of a fresh coconut, at St. Thomas, Virgin Islands?.. At
San Juan (see map) you're only 45 minutes by Clipper from St. Thomas.

THE MILLIONS OF

Tropical luxury. The Dominican Republic's
Hotel Jaragua, at Ciudad Trujillo, is one of
the most modern winter resorts in the West
Indies. Every room has a radio, telephone
and bath.
• and besides the ocean-water
swimming pool (above), there are tennis
courts, and an excellent golf course nearby.

PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS
WOKLDS MOST EXPERIENCED AIRLING
Four centuries will look down on you at San Juan, P. R. In the
background (above) is Puerto Rico's "White House" —oldest
governor's mansion under the U.S. flag! Built for the family
of Ponce de Leon in I>23, it is one of the finest architectural
gems in the whole Caribbean area ... Sir Francis Drake tried
to take the surrouname ronialeza i toya, Ductalled.
Today you'll be fascinated by these remnants of Spain's
ancient glory, and by Puerto Rican embroidery and handicrafts.
The System of the Hying Clippers
properties.sfomuseum:description: Advertisement from undated issue of Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “Plan now to escape from winter to these sunlit isles” with multiple color images depicting various tourist scenes in Jamaica, Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, and West Indies.
